attributes.description: Timing of the activity, in the form of a parsable string. If used, the preferred syntax is ISO8601 'R' format, but other formats may be used including HL7 GTS.
attributes.name: timing

attributes.description: Perl-compliant regular expression pattern, enclosed in  '//' delimiters, indicating the valid identifiers of archetypes for Actions corresponding to this Activity specification.
attributes.name: action_archetype_id

attributes.description: Description of the activity, in the form of an archetyped structure.
attributes.name: description

meta_info.description: Defines a single activity within an Instruction, such as a medication administration.
meta_info.name: ACTIVITY
